Articles.Content:
There is a new field in the ModuleEngines PartModule called engineType, which can take the values of the enum EngineType listed below. Does anyone know what this changes? As far as I can tell, everything that changes how the engines actually behave is controlled by other fields. So does this actually do anything?

engineType can take on these values:

EngineType.Electric

EngineType.Generic

EngineType.LiquidFuel

EngineType.MonoProp

EngineType.Nuclear

EngineType.Piston

EngineType.ScramJet

EngineType.SolidBooster

EngineType.Turbine
It appears to only be used by camera shake (to determine engine vibrations).

> 
> It appears to only be used by camera shake (to determine engine vibrations).

Many thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) How did you figure this out though?
